name: react_todo
description: A react based to do list application.

scripts.postinstall: mkdir public/vendors && cp node_modules/react/dist/react.min.js public/vendors && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/vendors
scripts.heroku-postbuild: mkdir public/vendors && cp node_modules/react/dist/react.min.js public/vendors && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/vendors

author: Hogan McDonald
